scripts.clean-tags: git tag -l | xargs git tag -d && git fetch -t
scripts.dist-clean: yarn workspaces foreach run clean && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules
scripts.version:bump: cd $INIT_CWD && yarn version ${BUMP_RELEASE_TYPE:-patch} && git add ../../.yarn/versions/* && git commit -m "${BUMP_RELEASE_TYPE:-patch} $(basename $INIT_CWD)"
scripts.version:release: cd $INIT_CWD && yarn clean && yarn build && yarn test && yarn version apply && git commit -a -m "release $(basename $INIT_CWD) v$(yarn run version:lookup)"
scripts.version:tag: cd $INIT_CWD && git tag -a "$(basename $INIT_CWD)_v${NEW_VERSION:-$(yarn run version:lookup)}" -m "release $(basename $INIT_CWD) v${NEW_VERSION:-$(yarn run version:lookup)}"
